title: What is it like for international students in New Zealand? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of the main reasons New Zealand is often overlooked by international students as a host country is because no one knows much about it, so it’s put on the back-burner in favor of its older brother, Australia. But we can promise you that New Zealand is a great place for international students to study abroad at! It has some jaw-dropping scenery, it has a unique culture, there’s plenty of things to do, it features world renowned universities (each of which offer a cheap cost of living and cheap student accommodation) AND its universities have expert educators. Talk about an all-rounder! In addition, New Zealand boasts a safe and tolerant environment for international students of all walks of life, including LGBT+. If you want more information, here is an article that details why New Zealand is the perfect study abroad destination for international students.
